title: Fersindo Nusa Jaya Sells 784,600 Sumber Energi Andalan Tbk (ITMA.JK) Shares
body: On September 12, 2025, PT Fersindo Nusa Jaya sold 784,600 shares of Sumber Energi Andalan Tbk (ITMA.JK) at an undisclosed price.  This reduced its holdings from 102,736,500 shares to 101,951,900 shares, a decrease of 784,600 shares or 0.76%.  The transaction is reported on the Indonesian Stock Exchange (IDX) website.

title: PT Trukindo Persada Sejahtera Acquires Major Stake in Sumber Energi Andalan Tbk (ITMA.JK)
body: On September 12, 2025, PT Trukindo Persada Sejahtera purchased 57,215,900 shares of Sumber Energi Andalan Tbk (ITMA.JK) at an undisclosed price.  This transaction increased PT Trukindo's ownership from zero shares to 57,215,900 shares, representing a significant new stake in the company.  Further details regarding the purpose of this acquisition remain unavailable.

title: Fersindo Nusa Jaya Sells ITMA.JK Shares: Sumber Energi Andalan Tbk Ownership Update
body: On September 12, 2025, PT Fersindo Nusa Jaya sold 561,800 shares of Sumber Energi Andalan Tbk (ITMA.JK) at an undisclosed price.  This reduced their holdings from 103,298,300 shares to 102,736,500 shares, a decrease of 561,800 shares or 0.54%.  The transaction is publicly reported via the Indonesian Stock Exchange (IDX).

title: Robin Sunyoto Increases HGII.JK (PT Hero Global Investment Tbk) Stake
body: On September 12, 2025, Robin Sunyoto purchased 495,000 shares of PT Hero Global Investment Tbk (HGII.JK) at prices ranging from IDR 3,575,000 to IDR 68,125,000.  This increased Sunyoto's holdings from 12,730,000 shares to 13,225,000 shares, a 3.89% increase in ownership.  This transaction represents a significant increase in Sunyoto's investment in the company.

title: Alim Investindo Sells Massive Bank Maspion Indonesia (BMAS.JK) Stake
body: On September 12, 2025, PT Alim Investindo offloaded 983,732,703 shares of PT Bank Maspion Indonesia Tbk (BMAS.JK) at approximately IDR 500 per share.  This reduced Alim Investindo's holdings from 1,870,763,156 shares to 887,030,453 shares, a decrease of 983,732,703 shares or 52.58%. The reason for the sale was not disclosed in the filing.

title: Charnic Capital (PT Charnic Capital Tbk) Sells Millions of Fuji Finance (FUJI.JK) Shares
body: On September 12, 2025, PT Charnic Capital Tbk offloaded 64,354,500 shares of PT Fuji Finance Indonesia Tbk (FUJI.JK) at approximately IDR 410 per share.  This reduced Charnic Capital's holdings from 159,217,900 shares to 94,863,400 shares, a decrease of 64,354,500 shares or 40.42%. The sale may signal a shift in investment strategy for Charnic Capital.

title: Investor Patrick Rudolf Dannacher Increases Stake in PT ITSEC Asia Tbk (CYBR.JK)
body: On September 12, 2025, Patrick Rudolf Dannacher acquired 20,101,500 shares of PT ITSEC Asia Tbk (CYBR.JK) at prices ranging from IDR 950 to IDR 1,030.  This increased his holdings from 82,570,050 shares to 102,671,550 shares, a 24.34% increase in his ownership stake.  This significant purchase represents a substantial vote of confidence in the company's prospects.

title: Hapsoro Sells 483.3 Million BUVA.JK Shares in Indonesian Stock Exchange Filing
body: On September 12, 2025, Hapsoro sold 483,333,334 PT Bukit Uluwatu Villa Tbk (BUVA.JK) shares at prices ranging from IDR 200–300.  This reduced Hapsoro's holdings from 1,629,004,459 shares to 1,145,671,125 shares, a decrease of 483,333,334 shares or 29.67%. The transaction significantly altered Hapsoro's ownership stake in BUVA.JK.

title: Wir Asia (WIRG.JK) Files Show Major Share Transfer by PT WIR Global Kreatif
body: On September 12, 2025, PT WIR Global Kreatif transferred 467,360,000 WIRG.JK shares at approximately IDR 170 per share.  This reduced its ownership from 1,126,066,410 shares to 658,706,410 shares, a decrease of 467,360,000 shares (41.50%).  The transaction significantly alters the shareholder structure of PT Wir Asia Tbk.

title: Arief Ismail Drastically Reduces Stake in PT Bank BTPN Syariah Tbk. (BTPS.JK)
body: On September 12, 2025, Arief Ismail sold 270,000 shares of PT Bank BTPN Syariah Tbk. (BTPS.JK) at prices ranging from IDR 1,425 to IDR 1,500.  This significantly reduced his holdings from 274,100 shares to just 4,100 shares, a decrease of 270,000 shares or 98.5%.  The transaction represents a major shift in ownership for the Indonesian bank.

title: PT Abadimukti Gunalestari Sells GPRA.JK Shares (Perdana Gapura Prima Tbk)
body: On September 12, 2025, PT Abadimukti Gunalestari offloaded 179,199,400 Perdana Gapura Prima Tbk (GPRA.JK) shares at prices ranging from IDR 120–139.  This reduced its holdings from 2,482,874,020 shares to 2,426,755,420 shares, a decrease of 56,118,600 shares or 2.26%.  The transaction may signal shifting investor sentiment towards the company.

title: ITSEC Asia (CYBR.JK) Insider Sells 1 Million Shares on September 12, 2025
body: Bima Kurniawan sold 1,000,000 PT ITSEC Asia Tbk (CYBR.JK) shares on September 12, 2025, at prices ranging from IDR 1,000 to IDR 1,030.  This reduced his holdings from 24,669,700 shares to 23,669,700 shares, a decrease of 1,000,000 shares or 4.05%.  The transaction was reported to the Indonesia Stock Exchange (IDX).

title: Ludijanto Setijo Sells Millions of Indo Acidatama (SRSN.JK) Shares
body: On September 12, 2025, Ludijanto Setijo offloaded 57,792,200 Indo Acidatama (SRSN.JK) shares at prices ranging from IDR 77 to IDR 78.  This reduced his stake from 580,180,612 shares to 522,388,412 shares, a decrease of 57,792,200 shares or 9.96%.  The transaction represents a significant shift in ownership for the company.

title: PT Chandra Asri Pacific Tbk (TPIA.JK) Sees Major Share Purchase by Edi Riva'i
body: On September 12, 2025, Edi Riva'i acquired 38,500 TPIA.JK shares at prices between IDR 7.575 and IDR 7.875.  This increased Riva'i's holdings from 67,700 shares to 106,200 shares, a 56.87% increase in his ownership stake.  The transaction represents a significant investment in the Indonesian petrochemical company.
